meanings.definition: The act of constructing or laying out a loft.
meanings.sent1: The lofting of the shelves in the garage took all day.
meanings.sent2: The lofting of the bed allowed for more storage space underneath.
meanings.sent3: I tried lofting my pillow fort, but it collapsed on me.
meanings.sent4: Her lofting of the tower made it stand out among the other buildings.
meanings.sent5: The lofting of the treehouse made it seem like a magical hideaway.

meanings.definition: A technique used in boat building to create curved lines.
meanings.sent1: The skilled craftsman used lofting to shape the boat's hull.
meanings.sent2: The precision of lofting ensures the boat's elegant curves.
meanings.sent3: The pirates were impressed by the artistry of the lofting process.
meanings.sent4: The lofting of the ship's design resembled a graceful swan.
meanings.sent5: The lofting of the boat's frame was like sculpting a work of art.

meanings.definition: The process of projecting a design onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: The lofting of the blueprint onto the wall revealed the intricate details.
meanings.sent2: Architects use lofting to transfer their ideas onto paper.
meanings.sent3: The accidental lofting of the paint splatter created a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The lofting of the constellation onto the ceiling brought a celestial touch.
meanings.sent5: The lofting of the mural onto the building facade transformed the street.
